picked_headlines.summary: IBM's CUGA showcases enterprise AI deployment with new benchmarks.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article bridges research and practical application, highlighting IBM's deployment of AI in enterprise settings, making it relevant for both technical and management audiences.

picked_headlines.summary: MCP servers enhance AI capabilities with diverse use cases.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This piece offers insights into the practical engineering and management aspects of deploying MCP servers, appealing to both technical and stakeholder interests.

digest:
- *MixLM* enhances LLM ranking by reducing input context length, boosting throughput 10x while maintaining relevance. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07846)
- *ThreadWeaver* achieves high accuracy and reduced latency in LLMs without custom engines. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07843)
- *Edge Deployment* study compares CPU, GPU, and NPU performance for Small Language Models, highlighting NPUs as the most efficient option. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22334)
- *MARINE* optimizes multi-agent reasoning in LLMs, enhancing performance with fewer parameters. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07898)
- *DeepCode* introduces a novel framework for autonomous coding, outperforming existing agents in document-to-code synthesis. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07921)
- *SolidGPT* is an edge-cloud hybrid AI tool enhancing developer productivity with semantic code navigation. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.08286)
- *CFD-copilot* uses a specialized LLM to automate CFD simulations, enhancing setup and execution. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07917)
- *PrivTune* enhances privacy in fine-tuning large language models by using Split Learning. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.08809)
- *Aetheria* is a new framework for content safety using multi-agent debate, enhancing accuracy in moderation systems. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.02530)
- *Visionary* is a web-native platform for efficient real-time Gaussian Splatting, enhancing 3D rendering. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.08478)
